items.sentence: Yesterday was the first time Tom had ever played in front of an audience.
Tom told Mary that he would be quitting his job and going back to Boston.
Tom doesn\'t have Mary\'s address in Boston, but he has her phone number.
I\'m surprised Tom doesn\'t know how to sing at least one song in French.
All you have to do is write a few sentences about what you did yesterday.
Can you get that medicine over the counter or do you need a prescription?
I can bring in some more sophisticated equipment if you think we need it.
The ozone layer helps protect us from ultraviolet radiation from the sun.
There were a lot of empty beer bottles lying on the ground near the tent.
To be a good translator, I think Tom needs to hone his skills a bit more.
